title: England's wealth from wool
creator_credit: Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and Basic Films
brief_description: Illustrates the extent of sheep farming in Britain in the early Middle Ages, from the beginning of the export trade in wool through to the Industrial Revolution and the gradual introduction of machine methods into the wool industry.
